In Lesson 9 we provide a case study of [`RsNLME`](https://certara.github.io/R-RsNLME/), demonstrating an end to end workflow using the suite of R packages and Shiny applications developed by Certara.

<br></br>

### Webinar Overview

In the webinar we will cover the following topics:

* Create a base model and explore covariate effects
* Evaluate model diagnostic plots
* Perform a Visual Predictive Check (VPC)
* Use RMarkdown to generate a report
